nodes.text: The Original Trilogy Read-Along Storybook and CD Collection

The Original Trilogy Read-Along Storybook and CD Collection is a paperback compendium of the three previously released original trilogy Read-Along storybooks from Disney–Lucasfilm Press: A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi. The stories are adapted by Randy Thornton, narrated by Chuck Riley, and illustrated by Brian Rood. It was released on September 4, 2018.
